Cynthia Velazquez

Real Estate Photographer

About Me

Hi, my name is Cynthia Velazquez. I live in Harrisburg, North Carolina. I relocated 17 years ago from the city that never sleeps NYC. I'm a full-time Finance manager and have 5+ years Real Estate experience. I have a passion for real estate photography as I love to take pictures of almost about anything. I enjoy traveling, ocean views and making others happy. I love keeping things simple in life and on set as I find it always produces the best results. No matter the size of the project I always bring the same passion and dedication to each job and it's my priority to make sure everyone is happy! Let's connect and make awesome work together.

High Quality Photos for your real estate

I will help you market your real estate by providing you high quality photos for your property.
